text: Bright, bright golden. Clear. Thin yet dense head. Aroma is melon. Taste is sweet fruit with a big, bitter finish.
Bottle (at koht). Pours golden with whiteish head. Aroma is grassy, fruity, citrus. Flavor is sweet and bitter, malt, grass, citrus. Overall: good.

Draft glass @ CML Fontainas. 100 % clear golden, creamy collapsing white head. Nose is faintly bitter, easy grainy, fluffy corn with some grass, pleasant vegetable oil, faint green olives. Taste is mellow grainy touch margarine in an actually pleasant creamy way, bitter cereal, creamy easy lager cheesy bitter, faint cardboard, low dough,... Body is margarine, bitter vegetable oil, cheesy with some margarine. Pretty good pilsner, there are some minor points. Same notes have oddly have pro & cons, part of the margarine notes are both positive & negative. Enjoyed it. Not bad. Pleasant to drink for sure.

330ml bottle. Slightly hazy golden color. Medium size, bubbly white head, stays. Herbal, rubber, plastic and sweet in aroma. Sweet, rubbery, herbal, fruity, hay in taste. Spicy hops, rubbery and herbal in aftertaste. Soft plus carbonation. Drinkable brew.

Bottle @ deTolly, Tartu. Pours slightly hazy golden with small sticky white head. Aroma: hay, malty, some sourness, cow shit, Taste:hay, grass, medium bitter, oak corn. Thin + body. Nice bitter finish. Really good lager.

On tap at the lentebeir festival the Hague. 
Medium creamy white head. Hazy golden pour. Nice bitterness.

Tap at Grote Markt festival. Slight hazy straw with white head. Lemon, lots of dust, dried banana, grassy, flowery, green nuts, cilantro. Light sweet and under medium bitter. Light bodied with a bit creamy feel. Weird stuff, dont like the dusty notes.

Tap at Lentebier festival. Hazy pale golden with white head. Sweet fruity, grassy, lemon, light doughy. Under medium sweet and light bitter. Over medium bodied, creamy, soft carbonation. Nice refreshing drink! Like this kind of light refreshing beers!

33cl bottle. Pours light hazy golden with a beautiful creamy white head. Aroma is malts and sweet fruits, taste is similar with also some citrus notes. Dry vegetal bitterness, dont know what catnip tastes like but there is some unusual herbal aftertaste. Light body, watery texture, a bit too thin and carbonated.

If you dont know what catnip tastes like you wouldnt find it. The mintlike flavors are present, but in a way that hops could do as well. This is a really funny. And very good to drink, beer.

Oproer tap

Bottle from Uba ja Humal in Tallinn ( 4.70). So... A lager with catnip... Thats a first. Pours slightly hazy yellow with a good creamy white head. The aroma is definitely herby, grassy, sweet - rather attractive to be honest. Would be hard pressed if I had to guess the exact ingredient. At first I got more APA-like floral and soapy notes than catnip though. Tastes sweet and bitter, with the herby catnip definitely giving it some uniqueness (it kinda reminds me of some of the juniper beers Ive had). Slickish on the palate with moderate carbonation, good drinkability. I quite like it despite the grassy-herbal harshness now and then, and its kinship to an APA.

330ml bottle - Thanks Kairi!
Sweet floral lager aroma. Taste sweet and floral too, but also a bit floury too. Zingy citrussy hops, sweet and sherbetty. Some almondy plasticky aspects, but not unpleasant. Quite an unusual lager, definitely characterful.

Draft at Ma che siete venuti a fa Rome Italy 03.12.2015.Taste with ippopotamo36 bro, Mortlach and cika Boban.Pour it clear golden color with medium white head.Aroma citrus, yeasty.Taste malty, some sweet fruits on the back, lemon, nice balanced and very interesting.

Tap at the Huppel, Den Haag. Poured a hazy straw colour with a thin white head and some broken lace. The aroma is citrus, yeast, light grassy hop. The flavour is moderate bitter with a big grass, peppermint spice hop bitter palate and a lingering bitter finish. Medium bodied with average carbonation.

Draught @ Lambrate pub, Milan. Pours yellow with a white head. Aroma of malt, light grainy, light buttery notes, grassy hops, light spice. Flavor is malt, grainy, light butter, grass, spice, lavander. Medium body, average to lively carbonation, light bitter finish. 111215

On tap @Ma che siete venuti a fà (Rome). Pours golden with a medium white head. Aroma is very hoppy, citrus, marijuana, lemon/passionfruit, very original! Flavour is light sweet with a medium bitter end, light malt profile, quite dry. Medium to light body, medium carbonation. Nice one.

Draft at Uiltje. Pours clear golden with a medium white head. Aroma of tropical fruit, light grain, citrus and light malt. Flavour is above ligt sweet and light to moderate bitter. Light to medium bodied with light carbonation.

on tap golden hazy good head citric light citrus exotic fruit medium bitternes 
oro velata buona schiuma un po grossolana persistente agrume frutta esotica passion fruit mango filo citrico leggera nota erbacea discreto amaro buona secchezza
